articles.description: Promising United academy graduate Tara Bourne heads to Birmingham City on a season long loan. Bourne signed her first professional contract with United last year. She then had two loan spells, first at Sheffield United and then at Blackburn Rovers. Manager Ma…
articles.content:

articles.title: Brighton can use Nathan Ake to give Man City a problem in Marc Cucurella transfer talks - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City held out on their valuation of Nathan Ake, and Brighton will have noted that ahead of Marc Cucurella negotiations
articles.content:

articles.title: Gabriel Jesus labels Arsenal team-mate Gabriel Martinelli as 'an animal' after shining in pre-season - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 25-year-old striker completed a £45million move from Manchester City at the beginning of the month - which he has now claimed is 'the best decision that I could have made'.
articles.content:
